title: brahmNDadoLage
sahitya:
brahmANDadoLage arasi nODalu nammUrE vAsi


anupallavi

  rammeyarasanu sarvadA vAsipa summAnadi tAnu


caraNam 1    janaja maraNavilla alli uNuva dukkhavilla anuja tanujaru allilla anumAnada solle illa
    caraNam 2    nidreyu allilla rOgO padragaLilla kSUdra janangaLu allilla samudra shayana balla ella
    caraNam 3    sAdhu janara kUDe mOkSake sAdhane mADe mAdhava purandara viTTala rAyanu Adarisuvanella balle
